name: Floppy Smash-Smash bird
description:
Welcome to Flappy smosh world!
In this world, you never be misused by bird,you can misuse the birds now!
Becareful!when birds hit by pile,bird will be angry and fly faster.Smashup the more birds in the same time the more score.
Tap Screen to play,don't let birds fly across piple.
